gstruct.name: GrtObject
gstruct.caption: GRT Object
gstruct.desc: the parent of all other objects

member.name: _id
member.desc: the identifier of the object that is globally unique

gstruct.name: GrtMessage

member.name: details
member.desc: A list of detail information strings belonging to the message
